creator: František Hruška
descriptionHtml:
Nonograms (or Picross) is favourite Japanese logic game where the player has to fill (or left blank) cells in the grid according to the legends at the sides of the grid to reveal the hidden picture.

- Monochrome and colored puzzles.
- Randomly generated puzzles.
- Over 750 puzzles.
- Achievements.
- Editor

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fixed:
- Solutions completed without line auto-complete and mark completed legends enabled can be now completed.

Added:
- Tutorials.
- New achievement - Paparazzi.

- Added 7 multi-colored puzzles.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Changes:
- There is no ad when the level is completed under 30s.
Fixes:
- Undo/Redo buttons do not change sound settings.
- Completed composed nonograms are now properly displayed in menu.
